cards.title: Thank You, Mom
cards.inside: Thank you for everything you do—especially the things nobody sees.

cards.title: I See You
cards.inside: The effort. The patience. The care. I see it, and I’m grateful.

cards.title: Home
cards.inside: Not a place—an energy. Thank you for making life feel safe.

cards.title: Proud of You
cards.inside: For your strength, your heart, and the way you keep going.

cards.title: Small Things
cards.inside: Your reminders, your check-ins, your warmth… they matter more than you know.

cards.title: Thank You for Raising Me
cards.inside: I know what kindness looks like. Thank you for raising me with love.

cards.title: You Deserve Rest
cards.inside: You deserve a real break. Rest without guilt. You’ve earned it.

cards.title: You’re Appreciated
cards.inside: You’re appreciated every day, even when I forget to say it out loud.

cards.title: Your Advice
cards.inside: They’ve guided me more times than you’ll ever know.

cards.title: Thank You for Believing
cards.front: Thank you for believing in me.
cards.inside: Even when I didn’t. That support changed everything.

cards.title: You Made It Possible
cards.inside: So much of who I am is because of how you loved me.

cards.title: Gentle Strength
cards.inside: But it’s powerful. I’m grateful to have you as my example.

cards.title: Gratitude
cards.inside: Grateful. For you, for your care, and for the way you show up.

cards.title: Always Learning
cards.inside: Even now. Even in small moments. Thank you.

cards.title: The Things You Carry
cards.front: I know you carry a lot.
cards.inside: You don’t have to carry it alone. I’m here for you too.

cards.title: Your Heart
cards.inside: The way you care is a gift. Thank you for sharing it so freely.

cards.title: A Simple Thank You
cards.inside: Just a simple, honest thank you. I love and appreciate you.

cards.title: You Matter
cards.inside: Your needs, your dreams, your happiness—just as much as everyone else’s.

cards.title: I’m Thinking of You
cards.inside: Sending comfort, peace, and a little extra light your way today.

cards.title: Your Support
cards.inside: It has been steady, real, and life-changing.

cards.title: The Best Parts
cards.inside: I learned from you. Thank you for your love and guidance.

cards.title: Proud to Be Yours
cards.inside: Thank you for being my mom, exactly as you are.

cards.title: A Warm Hug
cards.inside: The kind that says: I’m with you. I appreciate you. I love you.

cards.title: Always
cards.inside: Always grateful. Always proud. Always love.
